meanings.definition: Small openings in the skin that allow sweat and other substances to pass through.
meanings.sent1: The pores on my face help release oils and sweat.
meanings.sent2: She cleanses her face to keep her pores clear.
meanings.sent3: The tiny pores on the sponge soaked up all the water!
meanings.sent4: The city streets were like pores on the surface of the earth, allowing movement.
meanings.sent5: The pores of the tree bark absorbed the rain, quenching its thirst.
